sentences.en: A charm from the skies seems hallow us there.
sentences.cn: 好似从空而降的魔力,使我们依恋着家的神圣.

sentences.en: A hallow tomato to be stuffed with south France spices and minced beef, with butter toasted.
sentences.cn: 挖空的红蕃茄内填入南法香料、蕃茄与低筋牛绞肉, 拌牛油烤出鲜浓茄汁为佐酱.

sentences.en: An open enemy is better than a hallow friend.
sentences.cn: 公开的敌人胜过虚假的朋友.

sentences.en: But in a large sense we cannot dedicate, we can't consecrate, we can't hallow this ground.
sentences.cn: 但是,从更广泛的意义上说,这块土地我们不能够奉献, 不能够圣化, 不能够神化.

sentences.en: But, in a larger sense, we can not dedicate - we can not 6 consecrate hallow - this ground.
sentences.cn: 可是, 从更广的意义上说, 我们并不能奉献这块土地 - 们不能使之神圣-们也不能使之光荣.

sentences.en: But, in a larger sense, we can not dedicate - we can not consecrate - we can not hallow - this ground.
sentences.cn: 然, 于更广阔之意义上, 吾辈无从题献 — 无从圣化 — 无从顶礼斯土.

sentences.en: But, in a larger sense, we can not dedicate - we cannot consecrate - we cannot hallow - this ground.
sentences.cn: 可是, 就更深一层意义而言, 我们是无从奉献这片土地的 -- 无从使它成为圣地--也不能把它变为人们景仰之所.

sentences.en: But, in a larger sense, we can not dedicate — we can not consecrate — we can not hallow — this ground.
sentences.cn: 但, 于更大意义之上, 吾等无法致力、无法奉上、无法成就此土之圣.

sentences.en: Hallow is usually used as a verb.
sentences.cn: Hallow一 词经常被用做动词.

sentences.en: Hallow out the tomatoes a spoon.
sentences.cn: 以汤匙把番茄的中间部份挖空.

sentences.en: Hallow out the tomatoes with a spoon. Chop the meat of the tomatoes and reserve.
sentences.cn: 以汤匙把番茄的中间部份挖空. 挖出的番茄肉切碎备用.

sentences.en: Hallow's End New Holiday World Event : The Headless Horseman has been seen terrorizing local villages.
sentences.cn: 万圣节新增内容: 在村庄中玩家可以看到恐怖的无头骑士.

sentences.en: The hallow tomato stuffed with mango paste, cuttlefish, shrimp, crabmeat, octopus, and fish slices.
sentences.cn: 蕃茄肉身崁入芒果泥和海鲜馅, 包括花枝 、 虾仁 、 蟹肉 、 章鱼 、 鱼片.

trans.tran_cn: 把…视为神圣； 尊敬， 敬畏
trans.tran_en: to consecrate or set apart as being holy

trans.tran_cn: 使成为神圣，把…视为神圣
